name: Clash of the Monsters - The Horror Genre Fighting Game!
blurb: Clash of the Monsters is a 2D Fighting Game featuring the classic Monsters and Heroes of the Horror Genre! For all fighting game fans!!

rewards.reward: No Reward
EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS!!! Want to show your support, but don't have the funds for the higher reward levels? We will take all the help we can get. This tier is for you =)

Dev Forum Tier - Access to the official Clash of the Monsters Development Forums! Anyone that pledges at least $9 will be able to interact with Adam and the rest of the game development team (we will be adding people soon!) for the entire duration of development on a daily basis. While anyone will be free to join the normal forums, the Dev forum members will have a huge impact on many design decisions in the game!

PC Download Tier - Full Digital Download copy of Clash of the Monsters for PC! The $13 cost of the game is only available through Kickstarter. The game WILL cost more than $13 when it is launched so please save yourself the trouble now. Did we mention that you will save $$$ if you help us Kickstart? =)  This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9 reward level.

Mac Download Tier - Full Digital Download copy of Clash of the Monsters for Mac! That's right... we love the Mac crowd and look forward to seeing Clash of the Monsters being played on both major home computer platforms! Just like the PC version, get this now because it will cost you more than $14 later! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9 reward level.

Multi Copy Tier - 2 Full Digital Download copies of Clash of the Monsters! You get one for PC and one for Mac! You can do whatever you want with the second copy, including giving the license key away to a friend. This reward level also includes a downloadable wallpaper set for your digital desktop featuring your favorite monsters from Clash of the Monsters! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9 reward level.

Special Thanks Tier - GET YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS!!! Ever dreamed of seeing your name in the credits of one of your favorite games? This is your chance! All backers in this reward level will be credited in the 'Special Thanks' section of the Clash of the Monsters credits! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9 and $20 reward levels.
Early Bird Beta Team - This is the same reward as Beta Team, but at a more affordable cost.

Beta Team - Once Alpha Testing has finished, you will be able to join the testing team. Your name will appear in the game credits as a "Beta Game Play Tester"! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, and $25 reward levels.
Early Bird Alpha Team - This is the same reward as Alpha Team, but at a more affordable cost.

Alpha Team - Shortly after the Kickstarter completes you will be able to play early Alpha builds of Clash of the Monsters to help us test the game! Your name will appear in the game credits as an "Alpha Game Play Tester"! You will also have exclusive access to the Clash of the Monsters Alpha Tester Forum where you will work with the Game Development team to eradicate all of the nasty game bugs that are sure to appear. This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, and $25 reward levels.

Boxed Copy Tier - We will be producing boxed copies of the game, and this is your chance to own one! Call us old school... but we still enjoy having boxed versions of our games to hold and look at! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37 & $50 reward levels.
Early Bird Team Member T-Shirt Tier - This is the same reward as Team Member T-Shirt Tier, but at a more affordable cost.

Team Member T-Shirt Tier - This tier gets you into the Alpha testing, but also includes an official Clash of the Monsters "Development Team" T-Shirt so you can proudly show the world that you worked hand in hand with us to help create this game! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, $50, & $55 reward levels.

International Name In The Game Tier - This is exactly the same as the United States 'Name In The Game Tier', but the T-Shirt and boxed copy of the game are not included due to us not being able to ship internationally. This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, & $50 reward levels.

Name In The Game Tier - This is your chance to have your very own name not only in the credits, but also visible in one of the game's stages! If you ever played Mortal Kombat 2 then you probably remember the graveyard where you could see the development team members names on the grave stones. This will be similar to that, but YOUR name will be the one seen on screen! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, $50, $55, & $75 reward levels.

Exclusive Collector's Edition Tier - The boxed collector's edition of Clash of the Monsters will only be available through Kickstarter. This is your only chance to get your hands on it! The collector's edition comes with both a PC and Mac version of the game, special edition cover art, an exclusive animation card signed by members of the development team, and a personalized 'Thank You' letter with your name on it that is hand signed by the development team (this letter will be a "Thank You" for your service as a game tester during the Alpha and Beta phases). While this reward is available in the higher reward tiers, it can only be shipped to United States backers. If you are an international backer, please be aware of this when backing the higher tiers. This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, $50, $75, & $85 reward levels.

International 2D & UI Artist Tierr - This is exactly the same as the United States '2D & UI Artist Tier', but the T-Shirt and boxed copy of the game are not included due to us not being able to ship internationally. This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, $50 & $76 reward levels.
Early Bird 2D & UI Artist Tier - This is the same reward as 2D & UI Artist Tier, but at a more affordable cost.

2D & UI Artist Tier - Are you an aspiring graphical artist that would love to see your art on screen in a video game? This is for you! Backers in this tier will get exclusive access to our "2D Art Team" forum. You will work directly with me and all other backers in this tier to create the game's user interface. Health bars, particle effects, textures, borders, special ability projectiles (such as fireballs), etc... Everyone in this tier will be credited in the game as a "2D Artist" in the 2D Art Team Category. You will be able to begin creating art as soon as the Kickstarter ends! This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, $50, $75, $85, and $97 reward levels.

International Stage Artist Tier - Are you an aspiring artist hoping to one day get into the video game industry? Here is your chance! You will be supplied with the software to design your very own stage that will be guaranteed to be in the final version of Clash of the Monsters! We will work hand in hand with you to make sure you follow the art style and to make sure that your work fits the theme of the game. Your name will also appear in the game credits as a "Stage Artist! We of course will make final edits to the stage if needed, but will work with you to make these final edits. This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, & $50 reward levels.

Stage Artist Tier - Are you an aspiring artist hoping to one day get into the video game industry? Here is your chance! You will be supplied with the software to design your very own stage that will be guaranteed to be in the final version of Clash of the Monsters! We will work hand in hand with you to make sure you follow the art style and to make sure that your work fits the theme of the game. Your name will also appear in the game credits as a "Stage Artist! We of course will make final edits to the stage if needed, but will work with you to make these final edits. This reward level also includes all rewards from the $9, $20, $25, $37, $50, $75, $85, & $97 reward levels.
